field.comment: If the user account was created via an external identity provider, put the id of it here
field.name: externalIdentityProviderId

field.comment: The user verification code used for activating an account and requesting a new password
field.name: verificationCode

field.comment: A user controlled "soft delete". Basically a user can deactivate his account with the option of reactivating it later on. In the intermediate the user is not included in any automatic processes.
field.name: active

field.comment: If a user is blocked (e.g. faulty login etc), this is the timestamp the block began.
field.name: blocked

field.comment: The amount of invites left that the user can do
field.name: invitesLeft

field.comment: The last time the password was updated (used to trigger password change)
field.name: passwordUpdated

field.comment: The last time the secret was updated
field.name: secretUpdated
